description:
Damien Chazelle, the Oscar-winning director of hit movie La La Land, has another musical in the works, this time a multilingual television series set in Paris.凭借热门电影《爱乐之城》荣获奥斯卡导演奖的达米恩·查泽雷正在准备另一部音乐剧，这次他将在巴黎拍摄一部多语种电视剧。

Streaming company Netflix said on Friday it was teaming up with Chazelle on The Eddy, an eight-part series that will be shot in France with dialogue in French, English and Arabic.流媒体公司网飞于周五表示，它在与查泽雷合作拍摄《旋涡》。这部8集的电视剧将在法国拍摄，且剧中将有法语、英语和阿拉伯语三种语言的对话。

It described The Eddy as a musical drama set in contemporary multicultural Paris revolving around a club, its owner, the house band, and the chaotic city that surrounds them.网飞公司表示，《旋涡》是一部以当代多文化融合的巴黎为背景的音乐剧，它是以一个俱乐部、其老板、室内乐队以及环绕着他们的纷乱的城市为中心展开的。

"I've always dreamed of shooting in Paris," Chazelle, 32, whose father is French, said in a statement.“我一直向往着在巴黎拍摄，”32岁的查泽雷在一份声明中说道，他的父亲是一个法国人。

La La Land, a romantic musical set in modern-day Los Angeles about the dreams and challenges of a struggling young actress and a jazz musician, wowed audiences worldwide and won six Oscars in February, including for directing, music and lead actress role.《爱乐之城》是以当代洛杉矶为背景的一部浪漫音乐剧，讲述了一名努力奋斗的年轻女演员和一位爵士音乐家追逐梦想并迎接挑战的故事。这部音乐剧赢得了全世界人民的称赞，并在二月份收获了6项奥斯卡奖，其中包括最佳导演奖、最佳音乐奖以及最佳女主角奖。

No casting was announced for The Eddy, which will be executive produced by Chazelle, who will also direct two episodes. The music will be written by Glen Ballard, a six-time Grammy winner.《旋涡》的执行制片人是查泽雷，而且他将执导这部剧的两集内容，目前该片的演员阵容还未公布。这部剧中的音乐将由格伦·巴拉德来创作，他曾六次荣获格莱美奖。

Chazelle's next project is a feature film about the life of U.S. astronaut Neil Armstrong, who was the first man to walk on the moon. Called First Man, the Universal Pictures release is expected to arrive in movie theaters in October, 2018.查泽雷的下一部作品是一部剧情片，讲述了美国宇航员尼尔·阿姆斯特朗的一生，他是第一个登上月球的人。这部影片被命名为《第一人》，由环球影业发行，有望于2018年10月上映。

（翻译：Dlacus）
